Title: Prohibits funding of any degree-granting institution of higher education if such institution permits certain organizations on campus
Summary: Prohibits state funding of any degree-granting institution of higher education if such institution permits terrorist organizations or activities in support of such organizations on campus; prohibits any student group or organization of receiving funding from the degree-granting institution if such group or organization directly or indirectly promotes, encourages, advocates, or engages in any terrorist advocacy or activities on campus.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting funding of any degree-granting institution of higher education if such institution permits certain organizations on campus
